questions: How much should you pay if you want to order an ordinary single room with an extra bed?
article:
Room Types                                    Price (RMB)
Standard room              880.00
Ordinary single room                               980.00

Suite                                             2280.00

Luxury suite (the South Building)                      5888.00
Luxury suite (the North Building)                      9888.00
Extra bed                                        100.00

* 12:00 noon is the latest checking out   time.
